name: Hammerspoon-extensions
tagline: Some pure Lua hammerspoon modules; mostly about window management for large monitor or multi monitor setups
body:
### hammerspoon extensions

Does stuff.

<video width="320" height="240" autoplay loop>

Your browser does not support the video tag.
</video>
